TopicTitle: Haul Heatshield in Flight. What am I missing

Articles.Content:
Hi recently got back into this game but I cant for the life of me work out how to complete this mission "Haul Heat Shield (0.625m) into flight above Kerbin".

I meet all the requirements but I'm not sure what to do next.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2926110625
Looks to me like the contract has completed.  Finish your flight, and you'll get the payout from the contract.
Never mind, I sussed it. All I had to do was jetison the heat shield when all were ticked

2 minutes ago, Geonovast said:

Looks to me like the contract has completed.  Finish your flight, and you'll get the payout from the contract.

Thanks but I was fairly sure on one of my tries I had them all ticked but as I moved out of the ranges they all unticked
